definition: suffix of a noun of locality
border area of northwest China (i.e. Xinjiang)
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 xi1 bei3 bian1 chui2

sentences.english: My little sister, you should firmly engrave, by the side of heart.
sentences.chinese: 妹妹，你要牢牢铭记，在心灵的边陲。

sentences.english: Bozhou city is situated in northwest of Anhui Province And south of Huanghe-Huaihe plain.
sentences.chinese: 亳州市位于皖西北边陲，黄淮平原南端。

sentences.english: Gongding Au deposit is a quartz-vein type An deposit recently found in the southwest Yunnan Poovince.
sentences.chinese: 本矿床属石英脉型，近年发现于滇西南边陲。

sentences.english: Ma Liu Shui was remote, even peripheral, in the old.
sentences.chinese: 早期的马料水远离市区，甚至可说地处边陲，这是。

sentences.english: Now, the end of your time at this borderland school draws near.
sentences.chinese: 现在，你在这个边陲之地的学习之期已近尾声。

definition: border station/strategic defensive position on frontier
Northwest China (Shaanxi, Gansu, Qinghai, Ningxia, Xinjiang)
to be located at/to be situated in
to garrison the border/to guard the frontier/exile to a border garrison post
